attributes.action: change the legislation with ref to Carers to be able to receive Carers Allowance and Incapacity Benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just the same as pensioners who loose the Carers Allowance when they become pensionable age.

Long Term Incapacity Benefit and Carers Alowance cannot both be paid at the same time due to the overlapping rule legislation.

So what l feel is that the legislation is saying that your cannot be Carer and be ill at the same time.

This is to be very discrimmimatory part of the legisaltion and my rights as a Carer and disabled person.

I have been a Carer for 15 years and since 2004 have been ill and now on long term Incapacity Benefit.

We should be able to claim btohe Carers Allowance and Long Term Incapacity Benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
